flawed_nl_solution:
Jay invited 22 guests and Gloria invited 36 so they invited 22+36 = <<22+36=58>>58 guests
They also each wanted a flag so in total they would need 1+1+58 = <<1+1+58=60>>60 flags
The craft store has them on sale at 5 for $1.0 and they need 60 flags so the flags will cost them 60/5 = $21.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12.0, not 21.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
